text:
György Szabad (4 August 1924 – 3 July 2015) was a Hungarian politician and historian. He was the Speaker of the National Assembly of Hungary between 1990 and 1994. He was a member of the Batthyány Society of Professors. He was born in Arad, Romania.
Szabad died in Budapest, Hungary, aged 90.

annotations.surface_form: Speaker of the National Assembly of Hungary
